prime_number.cmd: sudo docker run bench:latest kotlinc -version 2>&1 && echo '' && sudo docker run --volume $(pwd):/app bench:latest kotlinc /app/tests/prime-number/kotlin_jvm/cmd.kt -include-runtime -d /app/tests/prime-number/kotlin_jvm/cmd.jar && sudo docker run --volume $(pwd):/app bench:latest bash -c 'time -p java -jar /app/prime-number/kotlin/cmd.jar 10000 2>&1'
sudo docker run bench:latest python3 --version 2>&1 && echo '' && sudo docker run --volume $(pwd):/app bench:latest bash -c 'time -p python3 /app/tests/prime-number/python/cmd.py 10000 2>&1'
